channel.title: Self Learning on Anila Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Self Learning on Anila Blog

item.title: Career | How to Self Teach to be a Frontend Developer
item.description: Recently, some friends have asked me for advice about transitioning into a career in frontend development. So, based on my personal experience, I have organized these questions and answers to share with those interested or preparing to change careers, hope the article can be helpful to you.
